question.text: 由$\cos A=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$,$\cos B=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{10}$,得$A,B\in (0,\frac{\pi}{2})$, 所以$\sin A=\frac{2}{\sqrt{5}}$,$\sin B=\frac{3}{\sqrt{10}}$,$\cos C=\cos[\pi-(A+B)]=-\cos(A+B)=-\cos A\cos B+\sin A\sin B=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$, 且$0\textless C\textless \pi$,故$C=\frac{\pi}{4}$.
据正弦定理得$\frac{AB}{\sin C}=\frac{AC}{\sin B} \Rightarrow AC=\frac{AB\cdot\sin B}{\sin C}=\frac{6}{\sqrt{10}}$, 所以$\triangle ABC$的面积为$\frac{1}{2}AB\cdot AC\cdot \sin A=\frac{6}{5}$.

$f(x)=\sin 2x+\cos 2x=\sqrt{2}\sin(2x+\frac{\pi}{4})$. 令$2x+\frac{\pi}{4}=k\pi+\frac{\pi}{2}$,则$x=\frac{k\pi}{2}+\frac{\pi}{8}$,$k\in Z$. $$\therefore f(x)$$函数图像的对称轴方程是$x=\frac{k\pi}{2}+\frac{\pi}{8}$,$k\in Z$.

令$2k\pi-\frac{\pi}{2} \leq 2x+\frac{\pi}{4} \leq 2k\pi+\frac{\pi}{2}$,则$k\pi-\frac{3\pi}{8} \leq x \leq k\pi+\frac{\pi}{8}$,$k\in Z$. 故$f(x)$的单调增区间为$[k\pi-\frac{3\pi}{8},k\pi+\frac{\pi}{8}]$,$k\in Z$.
证明:$\because ABC-A_1B_1C_1$是正三棱柱,$\therefore BB_1\perp ABC$,$\therefore$ BD是$B_1D$在平面上的射影,在正$\triangle ABC$中,$\because$ D是$BC$的中点,$\therefore AD\perp BD$,根据三垂线定理得,$AD\perp B_1D$.

解:连接$A_1B$,设$A_1B\cap AB_1=E$,连接DE.$\because AA_1=AB$,$\therefore$四边形$A_1ABB_1$是正方形,$\therefore$ E是$A_1B$的中点,又D是$BC$的中点,$\therefore DE \parallel A_1C$.$\because DE\subset AB_1D$,$A_1C\not\subset AB_1D$,$ \therefore A_1C \parallel AB_1D$.
$\because f(x)=x^3-\frac{1}{2}x^2+bx+c$, $\therefore f'(x)=3x^2-x+b$. $$\because f(x)$$在$x=1$处取得极值,$\therefore f'(1)=3-1+b=0$.$\therefore b=-2$.经检验符合题意.

$f(x)=x^3-\frac{1}{2}x^2-2x+c$.$\because f'(x)=3x^2-x-2=(3x+2)(x-1)$, 当x变化时,$f'(x)$,$f(x)$的变化情况如下表： $$\therefore$$,当$x=-\frac{2}{3}$时,$f(x)$有极大值$\frac{22}{27}+c$, 又$f(2)=2+c\textgreater \frac{22}{27}+c$,$f(-1)=\frac{1}{2}+c\textless \frac{22}{27}+c$,$\therefore x\in [-1,2]$时,$f(x)$最大值为$f(2)=2+c$.$\therefore c^2\textgreater 2+c$.$\therefore c\textless -1$或$c\textgreater 2$.

对任意的$x_1,x_2\in [-1,2]$,$|f(x_1)-f(x_2)|\leq \frac{7}{2}$恒成立. 由第二问可知,当$x=1$时,$f(x)$有极小值$-\frac{3}{2}+c$. 又$f(-1)=\frac{1}{2}+c\textgreater -\frac{3}{2}+c$,$\therefore x\in [-1,2]$时,$f(x)$最小值为$-\frac{3}{2}+c$,$\therefore |f(x_1)-f(x_2)| \leq |f_{max}(x)-f_{min}(x)|=\frac{7}{2}$,故结论成立.
